biotools.summary: CPGAVAS (Chloroplast Genome Annotation, Visualization, Analysis, and GenBank Submission) is a web server which allows accurate genome annotation, the generation of circular chloroplast genome maps, the provision of useful analysis results of the annotated genome, the creation of files that can be submitted to GenBank directly.

bioschemas.name: CpGAVAS
